name: 陳亮嘉
objective:
Machine Vision and Image Processing Algorithm
Course outline：This subject provides an introduction to the process of generating a symbolic description of an environment from an image and the fundamentals of machine vision and image processing techniques. Lectures include the following topics:
1.　　The physics of image formation,
2.　　Vision system design,
3.　　Motion vision,
4.　　Recovering shapes from shading,
5.　　Shape from shading,
6.　　Binary image processing,
7.　　Photogrammetry,
8.　　Stereo vision,
9.　　Color
10.　　Object representation alignment, 
11.　　Camera calibration,
12.　　Computational vision,
13.　　Optical illumination,
14.　　Applications to robotics and intelligent machine interaction.
15.　　OpenCV programming and case study
16.　　Student final projects


本課程主要介紹機器視覺之基本觀念與系統設計、組成機器視覺系統
之元件 (攝影機、鏡頭及照明設備等)、重要之照像幾何學與立體測量法，同時
介紹二位元影像處理、視覺對準法則、相機校正法、計算視覺與打光技術等重要
基礎知識，配合影像處理演算法之介紹，使學員建立完整之機器視覺基礎與概念。
(本課程參考麻省理工學院(MIT)之開放式課程)
將包含下列主題:
o 影像之形成 (Image Formation)
o 視覺系統設計 (Vision System Design)
o 移動中視覺 (Motion Vision)
o 陰影成像法 (Shape from Shading)
o 二位元影像處理 (Binary Image Processing)
o 照像測量法 (Photogrammetry)
o 立體影像 (Stereo Vision)
o 對準法則 (Object Representation Alignment)
o 相機校正法 (Camera Calibration)
o 計算視覺 (Computational Vision)
o 打光技術 (Optical Illumination)
o 機器視覺之應用 (Applications to robotics and intelligent machine
